BLOOMINGTON, INDIANA

DEPARTMENT OF RADIO AND
N
October 10, 1961

LDI NG
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President, NASB
13U6 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Dear Harold:
Enclosed you will find three ideas of our artist for the
slides. You recognize, of course, that these are hurr¬
iedly done, and are susceptible to a lot of refinement.
But at least they indicate what could be done.
Regarding the cost — I can get these slides made locally
at the rate of $10.60 per dozen or $3 for £0, single
copy. Several copies would, of course, be multiples of
these rates. These prices are for good quality glass
slides.
ElmetxG. Sulzer, Director
Radio and Television Communications
